title: Searching: 1909-11 Cy Young Polar Bear Back (Glove Showing)
author: howardpwr06

posts.post_title: Searching: 1909-11 Cy Young Polar Bear Back (Glove Showing)
posts.post_content:
Im looking for a lower grade card but something with some nice eye appeal. Please scan me the front and back of the card and also list what you are looking to get on it. PMs work best or you can email me at [url]pheagles8606@yahoo.com[/url]. 

Thanks,

Chris

PS: Card must be graded. I am not looking for ungraded cards.
